about_the_game:
Adventure in worlds beyond with the Realities Expansion Pass. Amp up your loadout with special weapons and Artifacts, ready to battle strange new enemies and loot even more treasure!

Bonus Content:
• Duonic SMG (Corrupted)
• Death Grip Artifact (Corrupted)
• Satyr Assault Rifle (Corrupted)
• Heartseal Charm Artifact (Masterwork)

The Realities Expansion Pass unlocks access to:
• 2 CO-OP EXPEDITIONS: Adventure through the new VEKTR and Corrupted Realities!
• 2 NEW FACTIONS: Battle the Corrupted and VEKTR, and contend with unique enemy types, abilities, and mobs!
• ACE CUSTOMIZATIONS: Unlock a host of new options, from vibrant Outfits to terrific Weapon Skins!
• MORE ARTIFACTS: Loot dozens more Artifacts, and seek out exciting new ways to treasure-hunt on X-Isle!
• IMPROVED LOADOUT: Amp up your loadout with more Gear, Weapons, and Mods. Also, discover new playstyles with more Class Cards!
• REPUTATION: Increase your Reputation with characters to unlock rewards!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Korean*, Polish*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
